snippet: The university’s recruiting success in recent years shows how the profession is shifting from a focus on one doctrine to multiple ways of thinking.
abstract: The Upshot; Stanford University has over last few years drawn all-star lineup of economists, particularly top young economists, in bid to challenge eastern universities like Harvard and MIT for center of gravity for economic thought in country; change signals shift in academic discipline away from development of mathematical theories toward analysis of large data sets.
lead_paragraph: The university’s recruiting success in recent years shows how the profession is shifting from a focus on one doctrine to multiple ways of thinking.

headline.main: How Stanford Took On the Giants of Economics
headline.print_headline: The Star Rising in the West
